name: Lost Hope (Sneaky_Panda)
description:
You survived the nuclear bombing of one of the post-Soviet states. Having found a shelter with a small amount of supplies - it becomes your new home.

Get ready and go on raids. Find valuable loot, fight enemies and upgrade many different skills!

ATTENTION! THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA VERSION OF THE GAME!

The project is actively developing and will be updated at least once every one/two months. I will be very glad to your comments and ideas!

Control:
WASD - Movement
LMB - Fire
RMB - Pick up an item / view the characteristics of the enemy
F - Action
Tab - Inventory
